translations: v．剥夺权利，特指剥夺公民权：指剥夺某人或某群体的某种权利，尤指选举权。
· The new law disenfranchises people who have been convicted of a felony.
新法律剥夺了重罪犯的选举权。

sentences.sentence: This, in turn, effectively disenfranchises all those voters who don't support the pre-ordained winner.
sentences.translation: 这，轮流地，有效地剥夺了所有那些不支持预定获胜者的选民的公民权。
